name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Malicious Script Execution
description: This playbook addresses an incident where a PowerShell script was leveraged by an attacker to download and execute malicious payloads. It includes steps to kill malicious processes, disable PowerShell remoting, and perform scans.

action--afd3f159-ACEf5-4c56-a3de-afe2345.name: Kill malicious process
action--afd3f159-ACEf5-4c56-a3de-afe2345.description: Terminate any malicious executable that may be running.

if-condition--bde54ef6-8aa9-443b-9da4-56.name: Check if PowerShell remoting is already disabled

action--caa27cba-7ec1-429e-bc8f-11345678.name: Disable PowerShell remoting
action--caa27cba-7ec1-429e-bc8f-11345678.description: Disable PowerShell remoting to prevent further remote commands.

action--def39c47-7a61-491f-9ea7-ab344567.name: Remove downloaded executables
action--def39c47-7a61-491f-9ea7-ab344567.description: Cleanup any downloaded executables to remove malware.

while-condition--9d5636d8-e0d5-4e42-8b0b.name: Repeat until all malware is removed
while-condition--9d5636d8-e0d5-4e42-8b0b.description: Check if there are still executable files in the Downloads directory.

action--f012dc51-c3b5-4b78-af38-12345678.name: Scan system for additional threats
action--f012dc51-c3b5-4b78-af38-12345678.description: Perform a full system scan to detect any additional threats.

action--end--f8e0285d-f10c-4a9d-a3e4-123.name: Restore security settings
action--end--f8e0285d-f10c-4a9d-a3e4-123.description: Enable real-time monitoring to enhance security.
